department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
description: *Commercial and industrial services include commercial, industrial, institutional and general services. Services may be for new construction, rehabilitation, alterations, tenant improvements, partial demolition, repair, maintenance, clean-up, upgrade, materials supply, consulting services, and/or other related services, please refer to "Definitions" below.
duration_in_months: For Commercial and industrial services, maximum of 12 months for the provision of a complete scope of electro-mechanical repair services. For the provision of electro-mechanical repair services on an ongoing basis, maximum of 36 months.
